    ItemDataActivity
    ItemDataActivity is the abstract class of all the item activity of eVoterMobile such as: subject, session, quesiton This is the activity manages view - interaction,..
    ItemDataAdapter
    ItemDataAdapter is abstract adapter of SubjectAdapter, SessionAdapter and QuestionAdapter
    ItemDataViewHolder
    Holder view of an ItemData
